p: Intestine samples of dead piglets with diarrhea were collected from several piglets infected with PEDV from 2015 to 2016. These infected piglets were chosen from 4 different large-scale swine farms located in Beijing and Hebei provinces in China. PEDV detection were positive via RT-PCR. For total RNA extraction, samples were frozen with liquid nitrogen. All procedures were approved by the Animal Care and Use Committee of Beijing University of Agriculture (Beijing, China).
